quote: It’s possible that non-citizen voters were responsible for Obama’s 2008 victory in North Carolina.
quotePlain: It’s possible that non-citizen voters were responsible for Obama’s 2008 victory in North Carolina.
name: Donald Trump

checks.quote: There is no evidence to support that theory, and that’s not for a lack of attention. A federal appeals court has looked into it, as has the N.C. Board of Elections, and both found nothing of concern. Political scientists also disagree with Trump. And even if the study Trump was citing is valid – although many say it's not – it still doesn’t back up Trump's claim.
checks.quotePlain: There is no evidence to support that theory, and that’s not for a lack of attention. A federal appeals court has looked into it, as has the N.C. Board of Elections, and both found nothing of concern. Political scientists also disagree with Trump. And even if the study Trump was citing is valid – although many say it’s not – it still doesn’t back up Trump’s claim.

claims.title: immigrants voting illegally responsible for Obama's 2008 victory in North Carolina
claims.negative: immigrants voting illegally were not responsible for Obama's 2008 victory in North Carolina
claims.negativePlain: immigrants voting illegally were not responsible for Obama’s 2008 victory in North Carolina
claims.truth: There is no evidence, and people have been looking.
claims.truthPlain: There is no evidence, and people have been looking.
